roleset.name: enumerate
roleset.note: LIST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'list' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. (from list.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: listed-in
example.text: The Tokyo Stock Price Index (Topix) of [all issues]-1 listed *trace*-1 in the First Section, which gained 16.05 points Tuesday, was down 1.46 points, or 0.05%, at 2691.19.

example.name: listed-on
example.text: [Armstrong's shares]-1, also listed *trace*-1 on the Big Board, closed at $39.125, up 12.5 cents.

example.name: listed-as
example.text: Actually, about two years ago, the Journal listed the creation of the money fund as one of the 10 most significant events in the world of finance in the 20th century.
example.arg: the creation of the money fund
as one of the 10 most significant events in the world of finance in the 20th century

example.name: All args
example.text: Guadalupe's listing of her vacation house on Craigslist lead to its being rented out.

roleset.name: give a price
roleset.note: LIST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'list' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. (from list.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: listed-at
example.text: To confuse matters further, when UAL Corp. stock finally opened on the New York Stock Exchange at 11:08 a.m., [the price]-1 was listed *trace*-1 at $324.75 a share, up about $45 from Friday; in fact, its true price was $224.75, down $55.

roleset.name: lean, be at an angle
roleset.note: LIST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'list' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. (from list.03-v predicate notes)

example.name: earthquake damage
example.text: At a nearby corner, they swerve perilously close to a listing apartment house, oblivious to any danger.
